title: What is the best time to renew a cell phone contract? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why do you want a cell phone contract. No contract, unlimited data and texting. month to month plans start at about $30 per month with no obligation and the same providers. I use Verizon. There are also WiFi plans that cost less than $3 per month. Unlimited data and texting. Why do you think you need a contract?
